title: The lamentable tragedie of Oedipus the sonne of Laius Kyng of Thebes out of Seneca. By Alexander Neuyle
author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
publisher: In saint Brydes Churchyarde: oueragaynst the north doore of the churche: by Thomas ColWell [sic],
notes: Quire F is in two settings: (1) with or (2) without the comma after "London" in the colophon.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
